definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: drain out (cf. [[מָחָה]]; NH id.; Ar. mas.= suck, suck up; Aram. mas., [[מְחַץ]] suck or press out);—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf.  2 mpl [[וְהִתְעַנַּגְתֶּם מִוִּיז כְּבוֹדָהּ תָּמׂ֫צּוּ]] Is 66:11 that ye may drain out and delight yourselves, etc. (‖[[תִּינְקוּ וּשְׂבַעְתֶּם]]).
